data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Gold Dragons (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Gold Dragons


A Graemation Token pack of hand drawn digital character tokens, made for adventures set around Gold Dragons, their humanoid species.

Add some flavour to your Encounters, NPCs or to be used as Characters with these 18 Other Gold Dragon tokens. These Tokens include a Gold Dragon, a variety armoured Dragon humanoids covering all the core fantasy armours, and even some dragon eggs.

Included in this Token Pack:

  • Gold-Bandedmail-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Barbarian-Dragonborn
  • Gold--Bard-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Breast-Plate-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Chainmail-Dragonborn
  • Gold--Chain-Shirt-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Druid-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Eggs
  • Gold-Egg-Shell
  • Gold-Hide-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Leather-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Monk-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Platemail-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Scalemail-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Splintmail-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Studded-Leather-Dragonborn
  • Gold-Wizard-Dragonborn
  • Dragon-Gold

Released on April 04, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate License and any Ruleset.

data.short_description: Gold DragonsA Graemation Token pack of hand drawn digital character tokens, made for adventures set around Gold Dragons, their humanoid species.Add some flavour to your Encounters, NPCs or to be used as Characters with these 18 Other Gold Dragon tokens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
